memberdef.argsstring: (GraphicsContext *ctx, int width, int height, const char *title)
memberdef.name: InitGraphics

detaileddescription.para: Sets up the RayLib window, loads all models and textures, compiles shaders, and creates lighting. This must be called before any rendering can occur.

simplesect.para: Enables VSync and 4x MSAA by default
Hides and locks cursor for FPS-style camera control
Loads default textures from data/ directory

detaileddescription.para: Creates and configures the ODE physics world, collision space, and contact group. Also seeds the random number generator.

simplesect.para: Exits with error message if precision mismatch detected

briefdescription.para: Initialization and cleanup functions for graphics and physics.

detaileddescription.para: This file provides functions to initialize and clean up the graphics and physics subsystems. It handles resource loading, memory allocation, and proper shutdown of all framework components.

sect1.title: Initialization Order
sect1.para:
Typical initialization sequence:
InitGraphics() - Set up window, models, textures, shaders
InitPhysics() - Create ODE world, space, contact groups

sect1.title: Cleanup Order
sect1.para:
Typical cleanup sequence:
CleanupPhysics() - Destroy ODE world, free bodies
CleanupGraphics() - Unload textures, shaders, close window
